# –®–∞–±–ª–æ–Ω—ã –ø–∏—Å–µ–º –¥–ª—è outreach ‚Äî Rork-Kiku

## –û–±–∑–æ—Ä

–î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏—Ç email –∏ message templates –¥–ª—è investor outreach, partner outreach, –∏ pilot requests.

**–ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ:** –ü–µ—Ä—Å–æ–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–π—Ç–µ –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–π template –ø–æ–¥ –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è. Variables –æ–±–æ–∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω—ã –≤ `[SQUARE_BRACKETS]`.

## 1. Investor Outreach Templates

### 1.1 Cold Email ‚Äî Initial Contact

**Subject:** Introduction: Rork-Kiku ‚Äî Safe Parent-Child Communication Platform

```
Hi [INVESTOR_NAME],

I hope this email finds you well. My name is [YOUR_NAME], and I'm the [CEO/Co-Founder] of Rork-Kiku, a platform that's making digital communication between parents and young children truly safe.

**The Problem:**
70% of children 6-12 use smartphones, but 1 in 3 encounters inappropriate content online. Parents want to stay connected but worry about digital safety.

**Our Solution:**
Rork-Kiku combines AI-powered and human moderation to create a safe space where children can share photos and videos with their parents, with every piece of content reviewed before delivery.

**Traction:**
- [X] families on waitlist
- MVP 50% complete, launching Q1 2026
- Partnerships in discussions with [X] schools
- Team: [brief team credentials]

**The Ask:**
We're raising a [$500K-$1.5M] [Pre-Seed/Seed] round to launch our pilot and scale to [X] families. Given your investment in [RELEVANT_PORTFOLIO_COMPANY] and interest in [child safety/edtech/consumer tech], I'd love to share our vision with you.

Would you be open to a 20-minute call next week?

**Learn More:**
- One-pager: [LINK]
- Deck: [LINK] (password: [PASSWORD])

Thank you for your time!

Best regards,
[YOUR_NAME]
[TITLE]
[EMAIL]
[PHONE]
```

---

### 1.2 Warm Introduction Request (–¥–ª—è –æ–±—â–µ–≥–æ –∑–Ω–∞–∫–æ–º–æ–≥–æ)

**Subject:** Introduction Request: [INVESTOR_NAME] ‚Äî Rork-Kiku

```
Hi [MUTUAL_CONTACT_NAME],

I hope you're doing great! I'm reaching out because I'm raising [Pre-Seed/Seed] for Rork-Kiku, and I'd love an introduction to [INVESTOR_NAME] at [VC_FIRM].

**Quick Background:**
Rork-Kiku is a safe communication platform for parents and young children, combining AI + human moderation to protect kids from harmful content. We're building this after seeing the gap between parental controls (too restrictive) and general messengers (too risky).

**Why [INVESTOR_NAME]:**
[He/She] invested in [RELEVANT_COMPANY], which shows [his/her] interest in [child safety/edtech/family tech]. Our vision aligns with [his/her] thesis on [SPECIFIC_THESIS].

**Traction:**
- [X] families on waitlist
- MVP launching Q1 2026
- [X] school partnerships in progress

Would you feel comfortable making an intro? I can send a brief blurb and our deck for you to forward.

Thank you so much!

[YOUR_NAME]
```

**Forwarding blurb (for mutual contact to send):**
```
Hi [INVESTOR_NAME],

I wanted to introduce you to [YOUR_NAME], [CEO/Co-Founder] of Rork-Kiku. They're building a really interesting solution for safe parent-child communication with AI+human moderation.

[Your_Name], meet [INVESTOR_NAME]. [Investor_Name], meet [YOUR_NAME].

I'll let [YOUR_NAME] take it from here!

[MUTUAL_CONTACT]
```

---

### 1.3 Follow-Up Email (–ø–æ—Å–ª–µ –ø–µ—Ä–≤–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç–∞)

**Subject:** Re: Introduction: Rork-Kiku

```
Hi [INVESTOR_NAME],

Following up on my email from [DATE] about Rork-Kiku. I know you're busy, so I wanted to share a quick update:

**Recent Developments:**
- [NEW_MILESTONE]: (e.g., "Just signed partnership with [SCHOOL_NAME]")
- [METRIC_UPDATE]: (e.g., "Waitlist grew to [X] families")
- [TEAM_UPDATE]: (e.g., "Brought on [ADVISOR_NAME] as advisor")

We're making strong progress toward our pilot launch in [MONTH].

Would you have 15-20 minutes for a quick call this week or next? I'd love to get your thoughts on our approach.

Available times:
- [DAY], [TIME]
- [DAY], [TIME]
- Or let me know what works for you!

Thanks again!

[YOUR_NAME]
```

---

### 1.4 Post-Meeting Thank You

**Subject:** Thank you ‚Äî Rork-Kiku Meeting

```
Hi [INVESTOR_NAME],

Thank you for taking the time to meet yesterday! I really appreciated your insights on [SPECIFIC_POINT_FROM_MEETING].

**Action Items (from our discussion):**
- [ACTION_1]: (e.g., "Send Q4 financial model update")
- [ACTION_2]: (e.g., "Intro to [CONTACT_NAME] at [COMPANY]")
- [ACTION_3]: (e.g., "Schedule follow-up after pilot results")

I'll [FOLLOW_UP_ACTION] by [DATE] and keep you updated on our progress.

Looking forward to staying in touch!

Best,
[YOUR_NAME]
```

## 2. Partner Outreach Templates

### 2.1 School Partnership ‚Äî Initial Contact (Email)

**Subject:** Partnership Opportunity: Safe Communication Platform for Families

```
Dear [PRINCIPAL_NAME / CONTACT_NAME],

My name is [YOUR_NAME], and I'm the [CEO/Co-Founder] of Rork-Kiku, a platform designed to help parents and children communicate safely in the digital age.

**Why I'm Reaching Out:**
We're launching a pilot program in [CITY/REGION] and would love to partner with [SCHOOL_NAME] to offer your parent community a safe, moderated platform for family communication.

**What is Rork-Kiku:**
- A mobile app where children can share photos, videos, and messages with their parents
- All content is moderated by AI + human reviewers to ensure child safety
- Parents have full control and visibility into their child's activity

**What We Offer to [SCHOOL_NAME]:**
- Free access to Premium features for all participating families (value: $10/month per family)
- Support for onboarding and training (parents + kids)
- Feedback sessions to shape the product
- Early access to educational content and features
- No cost to the school or parents during the pilot

**The Pilot:**
- Duration: [3 months]
- Size: [50-100 families]
- Start Date: [Q1 2026]
- Commitment: Just participation and feedback!

**Next Steps:**
Would you be open to a 20-30 minute call to discuss how this could benefit [SCHOOL_NAME]'s community?

I'm available:
- [TIME_SLOT_1]
- [TIME_SLOT_2]
- Or let me know what works for you!

Thank you for considering this partnership!

Best regards,
[YOUR_NAME]
[TITLE]
Rork-Kiku
[EMAIL]
[PHONE]
[WEBSITE]
```

---

### 2.2 NGO Partnership ‚Äî Initial Contact

**Subject:** Collaboration Opportunity: Child Safety Technology

```
Dear [CONTACT_NAME],

I hope this message finds you well. My name is [YOUR_NAME], [CEO/Co-Founder] of Rork-Kiku, and I'm reaching out because our mission aligns closely with [NGO_NAME]'s work on [child safety/digital wellbeing/family support].

**About Rork-Kiku:**
We're building a safe communication platform for parents and young children, with AI + human moderation to protect kids from harmful content. Think of it as a "safe sandbox" for parent-child digital communication.

**Why Partner with [NGO_NAME]:**
- [NGO_NAME] has incredible reach in the [COMMUNITY/DEMOGRAPHIC]
- Your members are exactly the families we want to serve
- Together, we can promote safe digital practices

**What We're Proposing:**
1. **Pilot Partnership:** offer Rork-Kiku to your member families (free during pilot)
2. **Co-marketing:** we can highlight the partnership in our communications
3. **Feedback Loop:** help us build a product that truly serves families
4. **Data Sharing (anonymized):** insights for your research/advocacy work

**What's in it for [NGO_NAME]:**
- Provide your members with a valuable free tool
- Position [NGO_NAME] as a leader in digital child safety
- Collaborative advocacy (e.g., joint webinars, content)
- No financial commitment

**Next Steps:**
I'd love to set up a call to explore how we can work together. Are you available for a 30-minute conversation next week?

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Best,
[YOUR_NAME]
[EMAIL]
[PHONE]
```

---

### 2.3 Micro-Influencer Partnership (Parent Bloggers)

**Subject:** Early Access: Rork-Kiku ‚Äî Safe Parent-Child App

```
Hi [INFLUENCER_NAME],

I've been following your content on [PLATFORM] and love your honest take on [parenting/child safety/tech]. As a fellow parent [optional: if you are], I really resonate with your message about [SPECIFIC_POST/THEME].

**Why I'm Reaching Out:**
I'm [YOUR_NAME], [CEO/Co-Founder] of Rork-Kiku, a new app that helps parents and young children communicate safely with AI + human content moderation.

We're launching a pilot in [MONTH], and I'd love to offer you and your family early access.

**What is Rork-Kiku:**
- Safe photo/video sharing between parents and kids
- Every piece of content is moderated before delivery
- Full parental control and transparency
- Built for kids 4-12

**No Strings Attached:**
- Free Premium access for you
- No requirement to post or promote
- Just honest feedback (if you're willing to share)

**Optional (if you love it):**
If you find it valuable and want to share with your audience, we'd be thrilled ‚Äî but no pressure!

Would you be interested? I can send you a TestFlight invite as soon as we launch in [MONTH].

Thanks for considering!

Best,
[YOUR_NAME]
[EMAIL]
[PHONE]
```

## 3. Pilot Request Templates

### 3.1 Pilot Invitation (to waitlist members)

**Subject:** You're Invited: Rork-Kiku Pilot Launch!

```
Hi [NAME],

Great news! Rork-Kiku is launching our pilot program, and you're invited!

**What's Included:**
- Early access to the iOS app (via TestFlight)
- Free Premium features during the pilot ([3 months])
- Direct line to our team for support and feedback
- Opportunity to shape the product

**What We're Looking For:**
- Active participation (use the app regularly)
- Honest feedback (surveys, interviews)
- Patience (we're still improving!)

**How to Join:**
1. Reply to this email with "I'm in!"
2. We'll send you a TestFlight invitation
3. Download, install, and start using Rork-Kiku

**Timeline:**
- Invitations sent: [DATE]
- Pilot start: [DATE]
- Pilot end: [DATE]

**Questions?**
Reply to this email or join our community Slack: [LINK]

We're so excited to have you on this journey with us!

Best,
[YOUR_NAME] and the Rork-Kiku Team
```

---

### 3.2 Pilot Onboarding Email (after acceptance)

**Subject:** Welcome to Rork-Kiku! üéâ Next Steps

```
Hi [NAME],

Welcome to the Rork-Kiku pilot! We're thrilled to have you.

**Getting Started (3 Easy Steps):**

**Step 1: Install TestFlight**
- Download TestFlight from the App Store: [LINK]

**Step 2: Accept Our Invitation**
- Check your email for TestFlight invitation
- Click "View in TestFlight" or "Start Testing"

**Step 3: Set Up Your Account**
- Open Rork-Kiku
- Register as a Parent
- Create your child's profile
- Connect your child's device (using QR code or invite code)

**Resources:**
- Video Tutorial: [LINK]
- User Guide: [LINK]
- FAQ: [LINK]
- Support: [EMAIL] or in-app chat

**What to Expect:**
- Week 1-2: Get comfortable with the app
- Week 3: Short survey (5 minutes)
- Week 6: Optional interview (30 minutes)
- Week 12: Final survey and pilot completion

**Have Questions?**
Reply to this email or ping us in Slack: [LINK]

Thanks for being a pilot tester!

Best,
[YOUR_NAME]
Rork-Kiku Team
```

---

## 4. Personalization Variables

When using these templates, replace:

**Investor Outreach:**
- `[INVESTOR_NAME]` ‚Äî investor's first name
- `[YOUR_NAME]` ‚Äî your name
- `[TITLE]` ‚Äî CEO, Co-Founder, etc.
- `[RELEVANT_PORTFOLIO_COMPANY]` ‚Äî company in their portfolio
- `[SPECIFIC_THESIS]` ‚Äî their investment thesis (from website/LinkedIn)
- `[X]` ‚Äî actual numbers (waitlist, families, etc.)

**Partner Outreach:**
- `[PRINCIPAL_NAME]` ‚Äî school principal or contact
- `[SCHOOL_NAME]` ‚Äî name of school
- `[NGO_NAME]` ‚Äî name of NGO
- `[COMMUNITY/DEMOGRAPHIC]` ‚Äî specific community they serve
- `[INFLUENCER_NAME]` ‚Äî influencer's name
- `[PLATFORM]` ‚Äî Instagram, TikTok, Blog, YouTube

**Pilot:**
- `[NAME]` ‚Äî recipient's first name
- `[DATE]` ‚Äî specific dates
- `[LINK]` ‚Äî actual links

---

## 5. Email Best Practices

### Do's:
- ‚úÖ Personalize –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–µ –ø–∏—Å—å–º–æ (minimum: name + 1 specific detail)
- ‚úÖ Keep subject lines short –∏ specific (< 60 chars)
- ‚úÖ Lead with the problem, then solution
- ‚úÖ Clear call-to-action (CTA)
- ‚úÖ Follow up (but not too often: 3-5 days spacing)
- ‚úÖ Proofread (typos = unprofessional)

### Don'ts:
- ‚ùå Mass BCC emails (–≤—ã–≥–ª—è–¥–∏—Ç –∫–∞–∫ spam)
- ‚ùå Attachments –≤ –ø–µ—Ä–≤–æ–º email (some block)
- ‚ùå Too long (keep < 200 words –¥–ª—è cold emails)
- ‚ùå Pushy –∏–ª–∏ desperate tone
- ‚ùå Generic templates –±–µ–∑ personalization

### Timing:
- **Best days:** Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday
- **Best times:** 9-11 AM –∏–ª–∏ 2-4 PM (local time)
- **Avoid:** Mondays (busy), Fridays (weekend mode), weekends

### Follow-Up Cadence:
- Day 0: Initial email
- Day 3-5: First follow-up (if no response)
- Day 10-12: Second follow-up (with update/news)
- Day 20-25: Final follow-up ("Closing our books soon" –∏–ª–∏ "Update on progress")

---

## 6. Tracking –∏ Metrics

**Track:**
- Open rate (aim: 30-40%)
- Response rate (aim: 10-20% –¥–ª—è warm intros, 1-5% for cold)
- Meeting conversion (aim: 50%+ of responses)
- Time to response

**Tools:**
- Email tracking: Mailtrack, HubSpot, Mixmax
- CRM: Airtable, Notion, HubSpot, Salesforce
- Follow-up automation: Boomerang, FollowUp.cc
